objects.text: Hey, have you done the homework yet?
objects.name: texting1_1_1

objects.text: Naw...why?
objects.name: texting1_2_2

objects.text: Dude, I need help! You still have my book!
objects.name: texting1_3_1

objects.text: Oh yeah, lemme grab it
objects.name: texting1_4_2

objects.text: ....so I may or may not still have your book.
objects.name: texting1_5_2

objects.text: Aw, seriously?? You're so clumsy sometimes, you know that?
objects.name: texting1_6_1

objects.text: Yeah yeah yeah, hold on, lemme go look for it.
objects.name: texting1_7_2

objects.text: Hey, I'm still waiting on that text book, you know I need it to do the homework, too!
objects.name: mateo1_1_1

objects.text: Yeah, just gimme a sec!
objects.name: mateo1_1_option1

objects.text: Aight, I'll be waiting here 'til you find it.
objects.name: mateo1_1_2

objects.text: Don't you have straight A's?
objects.name: mateo1_1_option2

objects.text: Yeah, but I gotta keep those straight A's, buddy.
objects.name: mateo1_1_3

objects.text: Hey, don't forget my book!
objects.name: mateo1_1_pretextbook

objects.text: Thanks, took yah long enough!
objects.name: mateo1_1_helped1

objects.text: Hey, are you okay? You seem a little shaken up...?
objects.name: mateo1_1_helped2

objects.text: I, uhh, just...um
objects.name: mateo1_1_helped_option1

objects.text: I did...thing..?!
objects.name: mateo1_1_helped_option2

objects.text: Uhhh, alright, well if you wanna study with me, I'll be at the cafe in town.
objects.name: mateo1_1_helped3

objects.text: Luke, can you help me on question 3 of the physics homework?
objects.name: mateo1_2_1

objects.text: Oh, crap...
objects.name: mateo1_2_option1

objects.text: Dude! It's due tomorrow! You better get cracking on it.
objects.name: mateo1_2_2

objects.text: lol no way!
objects.name: mateo1_2_option2

objects.text: Aw c'mon, I need your help...Fine, I'll just ask Lily.
objects.name: mateo1_2_3

objects.text: Hey Luke, hope you were able to get the homework finished!
objects.name: mateo1_3_1

objects.text: Hey, you made it! Grab a seat.
objects.name: mateo1_Town1

objects.text: That book has to be somewhere on the trail in the woods
objects.name: player_prologue_1

objects.text: What the...?
objects.name: player_prologue_2

objects.text: Following a mysterious glowing light in the woods, what could go wrong?
objects.name: player_prologue_3

objects.text: Please, please, please don't be a demon going to kill me.
objects.name: player_prologue_4

objects.text: WHAT just happened!
objects.name: player_chapter1_1

objects.text: How did I...what the?
objects.name: player_chapter1_1

objects.text: So, where's your notebook?
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_1

objects.text: Uh, I'll do the homework later, I gotta tell you something...
objects.name: player_town1seated_1

objects.text: Aww, hey it's okay Luke, I always figured you were, yah know...
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_2

objects.text: ...playing for the other team.
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_3

objects.text: No! Well actually, yeah, but I'll get to that later.
objects.name: player_town1seated_2

objects.text: I think I have...psychic powers.
objects.name: player_town1seated_3

objects.text: LOL what? Wait so I was right?
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_4

objects.text: Yes, but also no, just watch!
objects.name: player_town1seated_4

objects.text: Well I hope you know I don't think of you any differently. I'm an ally!
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_5

objects.text: Shut. Up. Just watch!
objects.name: player_town1seated_5

objects.text: Woah what?
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_6

objects.text: See!
objects.name: player_town1seated_6

objects.text: You just hit the table with your foot.
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_7

objects.text: Ugh, hold on.
objects.name: player_town1seated_7

objects.text: Woah! Okay, that totally could've been the wind.
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_8

objects.text: C'mooon!
objects.name: player_town1seated_8

objects.text: Okay, if you're really telling the truth...
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_9

objects.text: Push me over!
objects.name: mateo1_town1seated_10
